thread.title: Dance Plus Finale: V Company win first season of Dance Plus
thread.title_full: Dance Plus Finale: V Company win first season of Dance Plus

author: Aseem Shrivastava | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Dance Plus Finale: V Company win first season of Dance Plus
text:
Dance Plus Finale: V Company win first season of Dance Plus By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 12, 2015 at 12:39 AM Comments 
Mumbai, Oct 11: Dance group V Company won the first season of Dance Plus on Sunday. Question Mark Crew was the runners up in the popular dance reality show. Hardik Rawat won the third place based on votes while Popin Ticko ended on the fourth place. The grand finale saw performance by all the contestants and teams who were part of the show from the beginning. Captain Dharmesh was the captain of the winning team while Sumeet lead Question Mark Crew. 
V Company won the Dance Icon of 2015 trophy. The winners also walked away Rs 25 lakh and a Maruti Swift. The runners up received Rs 10 lakh cash prize. The four finalists Hardik Rawat, Question Mark, V Company and Poppin Ticko also performed one last time in a final showdon before Remo announced the results. 
The finale saw Super Dance Master Remo reuniting with his Dance India Dance fellow judges Geeta Kapoor and Terence Lewis. They recalled how they chose the three Captains on Dance Plus show – Dharmesh, Shakti and Sumit. The judges joined the captains on stage and performed on popular songs and their popular dance moves. 
Dance Plus anchor and dancer Raghav, known for his slow motion dance moves, finally got a chance to have a duet with Captain Shakti Mohan. Raghav flirted with Shakti throughout the season and how could he not have danced with Shakti as the show came to an end. The two performed to a medley of songs which ended with the popular remixed version of Dheere Dheere Se Meri. 
But Raghav was Shakti’s second choice as she chose to perform with Captain Dharmesh as part of the audition before Remo, Geeta Kapoor and Terence Lewis. Dharmesh and Shakti performed on Khuda Jane Ki from Bachna Ae Haseeno. A disappointed Raghav could do little but wait for his chance to dance with Shakti. 
Remo described Raghav as heart of the show and also announced that the season 2 of Dance Plus would be back soon. He promised Season 2 of Dance Plus to be different. 
  12, 2015 1:44 AM Topics:
